Pre-Game Insights: The Pakistan team is licking their wounds after a defeat against India and needs a win to stay alive in the tournament.
Canada has shown impressive composure and form, bouncing back from a loss to Ireland with a strong performance.
The match will be crucial for both teams, with Pakistan looking to regain momentum and Canada aiming to capitalize on their momentum.
The pitch is expected to be fresh and could play a significant role in the match outcome.
Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan's performances will be crucial for Pakistan, while Canada will rely on players like Nicholas Kirton to drive their innings.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan's batting has been under scrutiny, with Babar Azam struggling to maintain his form in T20 World Cups.
Nicholas Kirton has been a standout performer for Canada, scoring consistently in the tournament.
The match is Pakistan's third in a row, and their ability to regroup and perform will be tested.
